name: Superpro Rally Tournament: Tournament Edition
description:
originally made in 2014 as a joke. This is probably the worst racing game ever made.  can you beat the two (2) rally stages of the rally tournament?
Press D to put the car into drive and tap the right arrow key to build momentum only when the "rev now" text is showing or else your shitty car will blow up. make sure to hit the brakes with the left arrow key before hitting the wall.
